tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_component_funding_description; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding_description AS SELECT f.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.description AS description, f.amp_component_funding_id FROM amp_activity_components aac JOIN amp_component_funding f ON f.amp_component_id = aac.amp_component_id AND f.activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_components c ON f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id JOIN amp_activity_version activ ON activ.amp_activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id;
